Value: Xero Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a software as a service company worldwide. The company offers Xero, a cloud-based accounting software that connects small businesses to their advisors. It also provides Xero mobile app; and accountant/bookkeeper tools, including Xero HQ, Xero Cashbook or Xero Ledger, Xero Practice Manager, Xero Workpapers, and Xero tax tools. The company serves various businesses, such as retail, e-commerce, information technology, non-profit, legal, hospitality, Amazon sellers, cafÃ©s, startups, construction, creatives, small business, healthcare, farming, manufacturing, tourism, and real estate. Xero Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Wellington, New Zealand.
